snippet: The two people from Manhattan were charged with reckless endangerment after a small drone came within 800 feet of the helicopter, the police said.
abstract: Wilkins Mendoza and Remy Castro of Manhattan are arrested after small drone flying near George Washington Bridge comes within 800 feet of police helicopter; they are charged with reckless endangerment.
lead_paragraph: The two people from Manhattan were charged with reckless endangerment after a small drone came within 800 feet of the helicopter, the police said.

headline.main: 2 Arrested After Drone Flies Close to a New York Police Helicopter
headline.print_headline: 2 Arrested After Drone Flies Close to a Police Helicopter
